result.title: Preliminary data and AI-driven style touch library
result.description: This deliverable will describe the first iteration of the touchstyle library and data on using it to create haptic feedback influence human affect and modulate higherlevel experiences It will be suitable for publication at conferences on haptics and humancomputer interaction

result.title: Comprehensive sensory assessment and sensory taxonomy of sensations enabled by non-contact haptic technologies, based on state-of-the-art psychophysical techniques and neurophysiology of skin receptors

result.title: Generalized experimental setup to integrate our devices with an experimental framework for WP2
result.description: A document containing a Schematics of how the participants will stand or sit in relation to the experimental apparatus b Descriptive procedures for temperature and humidity control as well as the sequence of events for a general user study c The placement and regulation for the various biosensors that will capture data for the AI engine both contact eg galvanic skin response oxygen concentration electroencephalography and contactless heart rate body and hand posture temperature change

result.title: Cross-projects collaboration plan
result.description: This deliverable will be coordinated with the other relevant projects The aim is to plan out the activities aimed at establishing synergies and cooperation across various projects stemming from the same call and funder under the same subtopic Further releases are foreseen at M18 M36 and M38
